subject: Bicycles and Bicycling
Tour de France (Bicycle Race)
Giro d'Italia (Bicycle Race)
lead_paragraph: Lance Armstrong crashed during the first stage of a five-day race and broke his right collarbone, adding an obstacle to his preparation for the Tour de France in July.
snippet: Lance Armstrong crashed during the first stage of a five-day race and broke his right collarbone, adding an obstacle to his preparation for the Tour de France in July.
